attributes.action: Work placements can enhance the learning of our teenagers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By making work placements a mandatory requirement of all education courses for 14-19 year olds in order to prepare them for the world of work and commerce. If leading and local employers got on board to assist the educators to provide and monitor such placements, it will give them the opportunity to train and develop the talents of all learners. In the long run it may help reduce crime and unemployment in all areas. It will also help the learners foundations for the future and enhance their learning and motivation as well as improving their communication and interpersonal skills.
